transcript:
Customer: Haan ji madam boliye.
Executive: Sir Meenakshi IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu. Kaisa hai aap? Badhiya?
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Sir aapki aapne bataya ki aap meri team bata rahi thi main aapko call karne wali thi tab tak maine dekha ki aapko feedback aa hi gaya hai. Not satisfied ka to maine call kiya. Sir aapki meri team ke sath discussion ho rahi thi aap ye keh rahe ho ki aapka koi product hai jo humne use ban kar rakha hai.
Customer: Matlab aapne nahi platform ki baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan matlab IndiaMART ke main bhi wahi keh rahi hu platform ke to main bhi IndiaMART ke representative hu aapko. Haan ji haan ji haan ji. To sir main ye keh rahi thi aapne bola uska license hai. Ki aap mujhe wo product ka detail matlab product ka naam aur product ki image de dijiye aur us product ka license mujhe matlab aap keh rahe the na ki license hai to de dijiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam us product ka license nahi hota hai. In general agar aapko India mein sell karni hai dawaiya to uska license hota hai.
Executive: To wahi main keh rahi hu aap mujhe dijiye main apne team se confirm karti hu ki if if unke pass already license hai. License to aapko tabhi milta hai na jab wo ban nahi hota hai wo kisi tarike se nuksan nahi pahucha raha hai wo product.
Customer: To aapko license milta hai to main yahi puchna chah rahi hu ki agar license milne hai.
Customer: License se koi connection nahi hai madam wo product jo hai wo khali restricted category mein dal diya IndiaMART ne to wo hata diya kyunki aap jo mere product list dekh rahi hai na suppose 50 product hai sab mein license lagta hai. Not even single one of them ki jisme na lagta ho sab mein lag raha hai to wo ek product hata diya hai ya wo category hata di hai baki to chal rahe hai na mere. Ye keh raha hu.
Executive: Aapke jo ek restricted product hai aap wo janna chah rahe ho ki ye restricted kyun hai right? Aapka restricted mein.
Customer: Ye maine query ek mahine pehle hi dal di thi bahut time pehle.
Executive: Sir mujhe restricted mein restricted mein.
Customer: Ye dekhiye aap ye khojiye aapko ye ek minute ye. Haan main dikh gaya 17 product aa raha hai. Rejected nahi jo rejected mein aa rahe hai 11 product.
Executive: Haan haan rejected rejected mein 11 aa rahe hai usme jo aap dekhiye jo third number fourth number fifth number pe aa raha hai.
Customer: Haan haan. Ye jo tazovin aapko tazovin dikha dikh raha hoga ek product mein.
Executive: Main samajh gayi. Aapka rejected mein 11 aa raha hai fourth number wala product hai.
Customer: Third number fourth number same hai madam. Theek hai. Third number fourth number product same hai bas brand alag hai aur jo sixth number hai wo product same hai brand. Main ek kam karti hu main ek kam karti hu ye sare product ki list bhej deti hu means ye sare ke sare jo aapke product hai 14. Theek hai? 11 sorry 11.
Customer: Hataiye main hata hi de raha hu ek minute jo usme kaam ke nahi hai na. Haan jo kaam ke nahi hai wo hataiye.
Customer: Hata de raha hu ek do ye bhi hat gaya. Ye bhi hat gaya.
Customer: Haan madam ab isme jo maine products rakhe hai na usme total panch hai aur usme teen different variety ki cheeze hai. Hai na one is pentazosin one is bupinorphine and one is tramadol aise teen alag alag cheeze hai. Aur jo do products hai wo bas brand. Aap panch hi hai. Theek hai na to ye panch ka issue hai kyun. Theek hai. Kyunki result rate koi restricted nahi hai India mein isko to jaati hai government ko bhi jaata hai government khud tender se purchase karti hai. To aur jo deactivated abhi aap usko chhod dijiye wo koi mudda nahi hai jo rejected mein aa rahe hai na panch cheeze aap isko solve karwaiye maine mail bhi bheja tha matlab baat bhi hui thi maine mail bhi bheje company ko but kuch response hi nahi aaya mahine se upar ho gaya. Ek second rukiye IPR mein kiya tha kya aapne? Na na na IPR wale nahi hai IPR wale maine hata diya IPR to main samajhta hu ki bhai wo to proper IPR ka unke pass ek hi bande ke pass right hai to they can only sell it and promote it uska issue nahi hai ye wala jo hai na isme trademark slash brand slash restricted hai to isme jo ye restricted category mein dal diya inhone jabki aisa kuch hai nahi restricted nahi hai. Ab ek kam karoge aap jo apna license hai wo mere ko matlab share kar sakte ho soft copy if you don't. Haan kar haan haan theek hai main kar dunga main koi issue nahi hai. Abhi abhi main na abhi main product ko apne mail drop karti hu ki for what reason ki ye wala product hum logo ne inactive mark kiya hua hai matlab rejected mein dala hua hai. Haan ji. Aur ye license proof hai customer ka to de. Ye jo ye cheez hai na ki agar ye product nahi sell ho rahe hai to mera majority part inhi se aa raha tha to mere liye to wo package hi useful nahi bacha IndiaMART ka. Maine ye bhi likha tha mail mein ki bhai aap mera package cancel kar do agar aapko ye activate nahi karne hai because unse hi chal raha hai baki to sab unhone bola tha ki aap dal dijiye do char product ke alava bhi kuch to ye maine faltu mein dal rakhe hai inme kuch zyada response aata nahi hai ya aata bhi hai to wo convert nahi hota hai to sab ke issue hai kuch na kuch. To aap ye keh rahe hai ki ye panch aapka main important hai right? Haan exactly. Theek hai samajh gayi. Main ek kam karti hu main puch leti hu aap mujhe ek bar main abhi aapko whatsapp pe hi kar rahi hu. Theek hai. Theek hai? Main abhi aapko whatsapp pe hi kar rahi hu hi karke aap mujhe details de dijiye wo wala aur ye main product ko main mail kar deti hu so that ki team isko check kar le main jaisa hoga aapko is cheez pe revert back kar dungi. Okay. Theek hai aur jo ye apne aapne call pe jo not satisfied ka feedback diya tha main use close kar rahi hu. Madam close mat kijiye aap kyunki main India dekhiye mujhe personally koi issue nahi hai. Theek hai. Nahi nahi it's okay no problem. Platform mein hota kya hai ki mahine mein ek bar team ko jagaya jata hai ki aap customer se baat kijiye aur aap feedback de dijiye but meri problem pichle mahine bhi wahi thi wo abhi bhi wahi hai ab main mere pass kya option maine mail bhi ki company ko koi response nahi hai to mere pass feedback ke option bach raha hai main change kar dunga lekin agar aapke performance ki baat hai to main change kar dunga mujhe aap se kuch personally nahi hai but meri problem wahi ki wahi hai na to karwa nahi raha hu main package paise deke plan le raha hu. Theek hai. No problem sir. Main aapko bhej deti hu solve karwaiye main khud ek bahut achcha sa feedback dunga aapke liye aapne dekhiye aap mere account managers bhi aap dekhna change hue hai multiple time because solve nahi karta wahi repetative questions karte hai aur fir bolta hai achcha ye dikkat hai I will come back to you bas kahani khatam fir do mahine baad ek mahine baad call aa raha hai to this is not the right way na feedback ka. No problem sir I will drop a mail aap mere aap pehle hi karti hu aapko aap mujhe details de dijiye main drop karti hu main fir isko check karate hai theek hai. Theek hai okay. Thank you sir. I'm not closing this right now.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's restricted products are not selling.

- Wants to know why products are restricted.

- Wants to cancel the package if unresolved.

- No response from the company after mailing.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for product details and license.

- Executive will mail the product details to team.

- Executive will revert back to the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, verification, restricted products, license
